parameters.name: Collection
parameters.label: Source Collection
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| distinct SourceCollectionName 
| extend Collection = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection", SourceCollectionName)
| project Collection

content.json: __Azure Purview__ Azure Purview is a unified data governance service that helps you manage and govern your on-prem, multicloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data. It creates a holistic, up-to-date map of your data landscape with automated data discovery, sensitive data classification, and end-to-end data lineage that empowers you to find valuable and trustworthy data. Learn More

content.query:
let NumberofSourcesByRegion = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct SourcePath, SourceRegion
| summarize AssetCount = count() by SourceRegion;

NumberofSourcesByRegion
content.title: Number of Sources by Region

content.query:
let allAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetCount = count() by SourceType;

let classifiedAssets =  PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand Classification
| where Classification != ""
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetClassifiedCount = count() by SourceType;

let ClassifiedAssetsByResourceType = allAssets
| join kind= leftouter classifiedAssets on SourceType
| extend ClassifiedPercentage = strcat(round((100.0 * AssetClassifiedCount / AssetCount),2), "%")
| extend AssetCount = strcat(AssetCount, " assets found in total")
| project SourceType, AssetCount, AssetClassifiedCount, ClassifiedPercentage;

ClassifiedAssetsByResourceType
content.title: Number of Classified Assets Found Based on Resource Type

content.json: To use the Asset Drilldown view, select a data source in the table below to get a list all assets scanned by Purview in that data source.

content.query:
let allAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath
| summarize AssetCount = count() by DataSource = SourcePath;

let classifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand Classification
| where Classification != ""
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetClassifiedCount = count()  by DataSource = SourcePath;

let AssetsDrilldown = allAssets
| join kind= leftouter classifiedAssets on DataSource
| extend ClassifiedPercentage = round((100.0 * AssetClassifiedCount / AssetCount),1)
| project DataSource, AssetCount, AssetClassifiedCount, ClassifiedPercentage;

AssetsDrilldown
content.title: Sources

content.query:
let classifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| where (split("{UserSelectedDataSource:value}", ", ")) contains SourcePath
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, UserId, SensitivityLabelGuid, SensitivityLabelName) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid,  SensitivityLabelName, UserId;

let labeledAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| where SensitivityLabelName != int(null)
| extend SensitivityLabel = iif(isempty(SensitivityLabelName), "No Label", SensitivityLabelName)
| summarize arg_max(SensitivityLabel, SourceType) by AssetPath
| project AssetPath, SensitivityLabel;

let table = classifiedAssets
| join kind= leftouter labeledAssets on AssetPath
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid, SensitivityLabel, UserId
| sort by ClassificationCount;

table
content.title: Assets Drilldown

content.json: __Classifications__ Classifications within Azure Purview display which sensitive information resides within your organization. A list of supported classifications can be found at Sensitive Information Type Entity Definitions.

content.query:
let TopClassifications = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| distinct AssetPath, Classification
| summarize AssetCount = count()  by Classification  
| top 5 by AssetCount;

TopClassifications
content.title: Top Classifications

content.query:
let TopClassifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, ClassificationCount, AssetName, AssetType, AssetPath, FileExtension, FileSize, SourceType, SourcePath) by AssetPath 
| project AssetPath, SourcePath, ClassificationCount
| top 4 by ClassificationCount;

TopClassifiedAssets
content.title: Top Assets with Classifications

content.json: To use the Classifications Drilldown view, select a Classification in the table below to get a list all assets scanned by Purview with that classification.

content.query:
let Classifications = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize FileSize = round(sum(FileSize)/1000000,2), AssetCount = count() by Classification
| project Classification, FileSize, AssetCount;

Classifications
content.title: Classifications

content.query:
let ClassificationsDrilldown = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| where (split("{UserSelectedClassification:label}", ", ")) contains Classification
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid,  SensitivityLabelName, UserId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid,  SensitivityLabelName, UserId;

ClassificationsDrilldown
content.title: Classifications Drilldown- Asset Level

content.json: __Sensitivity Labels__ Sensitivity Labels let you classify your organization's data in order to highlight which resources contain sensitive information. Labels can be set up through Security and Compliance Center and applied in Azure Purview. Learn More

content.query:
let SensitivityLabelsCount = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| where SensitivityLabelName != ""
| summarize arg_max(SensitivityLabelName, SourceType) by AssetPath 
| summarize LabelCount = count() by SensitivityLabelName, SourceType;

SensitivityLabelsCount
content.title: Sensitivity Labels Count

content.query:
let LabelPercentage = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling"
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(AssetName, SensitivityLabelName, SourceType) by AssetPath 
| summarize LabelCount = count() by SensitivityLabelName, SourceType;

LabelPercentage;
content.title: Percentage of Labels Applied

content.json: To use the Sensitivity Labels Drilldown view, select a Sensitivity Label in the table below to get a list all assets scanned by Purview with that label.

content.query:
let SensitivityLabels = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| extend newSensitivityLabelName = iff(SensitivityLabelName == "", "No Label", SensitivityLabelName)
| summarize arg_max(newSensitivityLabelName, SourceType, FileSize) by AssetPath 
| summarize FileSize = round(sum(FileSize)/1000000,2), AssetCount = count() by newSensitivityLabelName
| sort by AssetCount;

SensitivityLabels
content.title: Sensitivity Labels

content.query:
let labelDrilldown = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| extend SensitivityLabel = iif(isempty(SensitivityLabelName), "No Label", SensitivityLabelName)
| where (split("{UserSelectedLabel:label}", ", ")) contains SensitivityLabel
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid,  SensitivityLabel, UserId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewSubscriptionId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceOwner, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetOwner, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ActivityTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, SensitivityLabelGuid,  SensitivityLabel, UserId;

labelDrilldown
content.title: Sensitivity Labels Drilldown- Asset Level
